thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Ellassay Fashion sees FY 2017 net profit up 40 pct to 60 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Ellassay Fashion sees FY 2017 net profit up 40 pct to 60 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - shenzhen ellassay fashion co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Ellassay Fashion Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to increase by 40 percent to 60 percent
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 198 million yuan
* Comments that increased sales and inclusion of new companies as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/4JRTfq
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
